net.engio.blox.blockdef

Interface ICsvBlockDescriptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CsvBlockDescriptor

    public interface ICsvBlockDescriptor
    The metamodel of a csv block. It defines the blocks dimensions (i.e. start, end and header length) and additional properties (e.g.whether the block data columns are named). A block definition also provides a CsvFileFormat that describes the format of the csv data.
    Author:
    Benjamin Diedrichsen

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description

      Used to detect start or end of a block

        boolean hasColumnsNames()

      • getCsvFileFormat

        CsvFileFormat getCsvFileFormat()
        To correctly parse the csv data of a block some description of its format is needed. Each block may come with its own csv data format and thus needs a specific CsvFileFormat.
